Deisy is 30 years old, married, and has 4 sons, three are students in primary school, and the youngest attends preschool. She sells barbecued chicken and is asking for a loan to buy chicken, peppers, cloves, pepper, cumin, cinnamon, and cilantro seeds. She started her business 8 years ago, in the tradition of her husband's grandma who taught her how to barbecue. She goes out to sell her products on the streets in her community. Her business is important because it is a family tradition and she likes to make the food. She feels proud when they tell her that the food is very tasty. Her business is popular because of the flavor of the barbecue. Her dreams and wishes are to improve financially and for her children to have a better quality of life and be able to have professional jobs.

The members of the group want to tell Kiva and the Realidad Foundation: "we are thankful with you for trusting us and helping us with your loans to grow our businesses and help our families."

loans.use: buy live chickens, peppers, cloves, pepper, cumin, cinnamon, and cilantro seeds.

loans.name: Loeun

texts.en:
Loeun resides in Pouk district, Siem Reap province, where there was a great capital city of the ancient Cambodian people.  It is well-known for Angkor Wat temple. Loeun is now 32 years old and is married.  She has 6 children: five are single and one is married. She earns a livelihood by planting and selling vegetable crops.  Her husband works as a blacksmith offering his service to local people around the community.
 
In order to sustain her business in a stable condition, Loeun would like to ask for some funds from Kiva partner, HKL, to purchase some farming supplies, such as organic fertilizers, pesticides and a pumping machine.  These will ensure that her crops will be well-grown. This is a first cycle loan for Loeun with HKL. She has a strong commitment to operate her business because she wants to be a successful entrepreneur and attain what she dreams.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies, such as organic fertilizers, pesticides and a pumping machine.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 61 years old.  She is married and has six children.  She earns a living by farming bananas in the Philippines. Teresita is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm tools.

Teresita has been farming bananas for 12 years and also earns additional income from clothing sales.  She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farm tools.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 36-year-old married man. He has 2 children, who are enrolled in school. David operates a poultry business and sells his goods at wholesale. He's worked in this business for 4 years. His primary customers are restaurant operators. David's other source of income includes a farming business. He describes his greatest business challenge to be the high cost of transportation, and his highest monthly expense as food and school fees. 

He owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. David will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase poultry chicks and chicken feeds. He joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase poultry chicks and chicken feeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed and has 6 children. 

Elizabeth has pigpen that sells grown & matured pigs. She has had this business for 15 years. She requested a loan of 17,000PHP to purchase animal feeds for the pigs.  Elizabeth has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Elizabeth hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds for the pigs

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
Marciana is a 58-year-old entrepreneur from Trinidad, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari store business where she sells items like biscuits, soft drinks, spices and detergent soap. Marciana earns about 3000 PHP per month with her store. Marciana also helps her husband run their tailoring business.

Marciana has requested a loan of 6000 PHP to buy cloths and more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles and soft drinks. Marciana hopes for her family to experience a progressive life.

loans.use: to buy cloths and more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles and soft drinks

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 34 years old, comes from Nakuru, and is married to Jackline. They have two children who are in school.

Stephen has a retail shop that he has been running for the past two years and he has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy sugar and washing detergents to add to his stock for sale.

In the future, Stephen hopes to expand his business and open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy sugar and washing detergents

loans.name: Vebce

texts.en:
Vebce is 27 years old and married with two children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Vebce is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Vebce has been raising pigs for four years and also earns additional income from selling ready-to-wear clothing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Debbie

texts.en:
Debbie is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children. 

Debbie has a retail shop where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She is also making & selling snacks like "bitso-bitso". She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Debbie has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Debbie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Ma.wilma

texts.en:
Ma.Wilma is 43 years old and married with two children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Ma.Wilma is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ma.Wilma has been farming rice for 10 years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Booku Liggey Kahone Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "BOOKU LIGGUEY de Kahone" est composée de cinq femmes qui pratiquent la teinture. Elles font soit des prestations de service sur commande soit elles confectionnent des tissus teints qu'elles vendent à leurs clients. Cela leur rapportent des revenus assez consistants qu'elles se partagent équitablement.Elles sont toutes mariées et utilisent leurs revenus pour prendre en charge certaines dépenses d'alimentation, de santé ou de scolarité des enfants. La présidente du groupe (main levée) est mère de deux enfants.Elle tient une boutique dans son domicile et y expose ses propres produits. Le groupe sollicite un pret de 500000f pour renforcer pour acheter des tissus et des colorants et d'autres produits de teinture.Elles ambitionnent de construire un magasin de commercialisation de leurs marchandises.
texts.en:
The group called "BOOKU LIGGUEY de Kahone" is made up of five women who engage in dyeing of fabrics. They either prepare fabrics to order or they make dyed fabric to sell to their customers. This brings in a reasonably consistent income that they divide among themselves equally. They are all married and use their income to cover certain expenses relative to food, health, or their children's schooling. 

The president of the group (who is raising her hand) is the mother of two children. She has a little shop in her home and displays her own products there. The group is asking for a loan of 500,000 francs to use to buy cloth and dyes and other necessary products for dyeing. Their ambition is to build a store where they can sell their merchandise.

loans.use: to buy cloth and dyes and other products needed for dyeing

loans.name: Las Estrellas De San Marcos Group

texts.es:
Robisel cuenta con 36 años de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos los cuales dos esta estudiando Maria Guadalupe esta en 6° de primaria, Edisel cursa 4° de primaria y Oswaldo solo tiene 4 años de edad, su esposo se llama Epifanio es campesino.
Ella se dedica al comercio vende comida pollos asados ella dice que le va muy bien tiene un año con el negocio, tiene su negocio junto a la cancha del pueblo donde ahí la gente ya sabe que ella a muy temprana hora esta vendiendo el pollo, robisel invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para la elaboración de comida como son: chile, pollos, leña, carbón, etc. Ella espera que le vaya muy bien con el negocio ya que espera ir incrementándolo esta con todas las ganas de trabajar para ayudar a su familia.  

Robisel pertenece al grupo las estrellas de san marcos el cual esta integrado por 10 personas las cuales todas son mujeres a continuación serán mencionadas: Santa Ana, Idalia, Leobarda, Maria Marcelina, Leodegaria, Guadalupe, Rosa, Maria Soledad, Mirella, todas realizan actividades comerciales como son: venta de comida, pan, tamales, ollas y cómales de barros, refrescos, calzado por catalogo y productos de abarrotes, etc.
texts.en:
Robisel is 36 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom study. Maria Guadalupe is in sixth grade, Edisel is in fourth grade, and Oswaldo is just four years old. Her husband's name is Epifanio and he is a farmer. She works selling roasted chicken, and said she has had her business for a year and it is going well. She has her business next to the sports field in her town where the people know she begins selling chicken very early in the morning. Robisel will use her loan to buy supplies she uses to prepare food, such as peppers, chicken, firewood, charcoal, etc. She hopes her business goes well and wishes to expand it. She very much wants to works to help her family.

Robisel belongs to the Estrellas de San Marcos (Stars of St. Mark) Group, which is made up of 10 people, all of whom are women. Santa Ana, Idalia, Leobarda, Maria Marcelina, Leodegaria, Guadalupe, Rosa, Maria Soledad, and Mirella all work in sales. They sell food, bread, tamales, clay pots and tortilla skillets, soft drinks, shoes through catalog, and groceries.

loans.use: buy products like peppers, chicken, charcoal, firewood, etc.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Erlinda has pigpen and sells grown & matured pigs. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy feed for the pigs.

Erlinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, Erlinda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy feed for the pigs

loans.name: Meldyrose

texts.en:
Meldyrose is 19 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. Meldyrose has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 2 years. She requested a loan of 15,000PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Meldyrose has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Meldyrose hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Yav

texts.en:
Yav is a 33-year-old married woman with four children who has been residing in Pouk district of Siem Reap province. The family’s main source of income comes from their rice crops. Her husband also sells animals to add to their income. On her part, Yav is skillful in weaving mats from a special type of grass.

There are difficulties, however, in Yav’s family’s situation due to their lack of a family vehicle for transporting her mats to market and providing transportation for the entire family.

So now Yav is applying for her third loan in the amount of 1,000 USD from HKL through Kiva to purchase a used motorcycle to satisfy and serve her family. In the future, Yav wants to save money to expand her family’s businesses further.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle.

loans.name: Erenea

texts.en:
Erenea is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children.  She has a retail shop where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 15 years. She requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Erenea has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Erenea hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy  is 51 years old and is from Ndunyu Njeru.  She is married and has one child who is in primary school.

Lucy is a farmer and has applied for her first loan to enable her buy potato seeds and fertilizers and to pay for labor. She was introduced to KADET LTD by another client and is optimistic that her farm will do well after the loan.

She hopes to diversify into the hotel business in the near future.

loans.use: To buy  potato seeds and fertilizers and to pay for labor

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated and has one child. Maribel makes and peddles banana cue & sweet potato cue.  She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 14,000PHP to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.
Maribel has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Maribel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Booku Diome De Kahone Group

texts.fr: Les cinq femmes qui composent le groupe "BOOU DIOME de Kahone" sont toutes des teinturières. Elles ont reçu une formation dans ce domaine et se sont constituées en groupe de solidarité pour mieux mener leurs activités. Elles se sont  implantées dans un local qui appartient à la présidente et y reçoivent plusieurs commandes venant de toute la ville.Elles obtiennent ainsi des bénéfices assez consistants qu'elles divisent en 6 parts.Les 5 parts vont aux membres du groupe tandis que la sixième est gardée comme épargne dans leur compte à l'UIMCEC. La présidente du groupe( en jaune) est mariée et mère de quatre enfants.Elle vend en même temps des tissus et de l'encens. Elle aide son mari à prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de la famille grâce à ses activités commerciales. Afin de renforcer leur fonds de commerce, le groupe sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter des tissus et des produits de teinture. Leur ambition est d'acquérir une boutique d'exposition - vente de leur production .
texts.en:
All five members of the group "BOOKU DIOME of Kahone" are dyers. They received training in this occupation, and created their solidarity group to conduct their business more efficiently. They settled in a space that belongs to the group’s president and where they receive many orders from all over the city. They earn substantial profits divided into six shares, five of which belong to the group members while the remaining share is added to the group’s savings account at the UIMCEC. 

The president of the group (in yellow) is married with four children. She also sells fabrics and incense. Her business activities allow her to help her husband with the household expenses. 

In order to strengthen their working capital, the group members are seeking a loan of 500,000F to buy fabrics and dyeing supplies. Their goal is to acquire a shop to display and sell their merchandise.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and dyeing supplies.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: La Sra. Maritza tiene 28 años, no es casada pero es Madre Soltera con 1 hijos que tiene 3 añitos, se dedica a la venta de comida su local se encuentran en la zona Warnes,  Este préstamo es la primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  Maritza  va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de material de construcción para la construcción de un tinglado para su local, Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es hacer crecer su negocio y bridar mayor comodidad a su familia,  Maritza  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, el deseo de la Sra. Maritza es el de tener una casita propia y así poder brindar mayor comodidad a su familia, es un apersona muy trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Martiza is 28 years old. She is not married but is a single mother with a three year old child. She sells food at her place of business in the Warnes area. This loan is the first within the institution. 

Maritza is going to use this loan to buy construction material to build a shed for her site. The reason she is applying for this loan is to expand her business and provide more conveniences for her family.

Martiza confronts challenges in her business, such as the competition.  Her desire is to have her own little house and thus provide her family with more comforts, as noted. She is a very hardworking person with a wish to succeed. She is happy and grateful to Emprender for the help provided.

loans.use: to purchase construction material to build a shed for her shop.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is fifty years old, single and lives in the Philippines. For the past twenty years she has had a retail shop in the school canteen where she sells snacks like candies, cookies and beverages.

Leah has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan from them to buy more stocks of snacks to sell. Leah hopes to see her business improve.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of snacks to sell.

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en:
Fernanda is married and has 5 children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Fernanda is 35 years old.  Three of her children are in school.

Fernanda has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines. Fernanda requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts and to repair her tricycle.  Fernanda has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Fernanda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and repair her tricycle.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 61 years old and married with six children, one of whom is still in school. For the past twelve years she has sold ready-to-wear clothing and is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Teresita has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more clothing to sell. Teresita’s ambition is to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mail

texts.ru: Mail 40 let. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Mail jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. On uje 6 let kak zanimayetsya sjkotovodstvom i razvodit korov. On prodayet kefir i tvorog v magazini Baku regiona. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2350 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya kolichestva molochnogo produkta i razvitiya svoyego biznessa. On ochen trudolubiviy chelovek. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego otca.
texts.en: Mail is 40 years old, married and has two children. He lives with his family in Baku region.  He has been engaged in cattle breeding for 6 years already. He sells yogurt and farm cheese in local stores. Right now he needs a loan of 2,350 AZN to buy a cow in order to expand his business. He is a very hardworking person. He learned his business from his father.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 46 years old and married with three children who are aged between six and 21 years old.

Mary has sold clothing in Nakuru for the last two years. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our existing clients. This will be her first loan, and she is requesting 15,000 KES. She plans to use the loan to buy more clothes to add to her business.

Mary’s ambition is to expand her business and open a boutique in the future.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Osvaldo

texts.es:
El Señor Osvaldo, tiene 52 años de edad, está casado, tiene dos hijos con su esposa de 5 y 10 años de edad, quienes están estudiando y vive en Olanchito, Yoro.
Don Jose, tiene muchos años de trabajar con su propio negocio donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como ser: carnes, lácteos, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, etc.  Inicio con fondos propios y por su buena administración lo ha hecho crecer. El siempre quiso trabajar en lo propio, al cual  le dedica 15 horas diarias.
Esta solicitando un préstamo de 15,000.00 Lempiras para invertir en el negocio, surtirá de mas productos alimenticios, con el cual incrementara sus ventas y sus ingresos.
Con las ganancias quiere construir unos apartamentos para alquilar y generar otros ingresos para el hogar y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Osvaldo, 52, is married and has two children with his wife who are 5 and 10 years old and are attending school; he lives in Olanchito, Yoro.

José has been running his own business for many years where he sells basic staple items like: meats, dairy products, rice, beans, sugar, etc.  He started off with his own funds and thanks to his good administration it’s grown.  He always wanted to work for himself and he spends 15 hours per day at work.

He’s asking for a 15,000.00 lempira loan to invest in his business.  He wills tock it with more foodstuffs which will increase sales and income. 

He wants to use profits earned to build some apartments to rent and generate additional income for his home and to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Maria Suyapa

texts.es:
María Suyapa tiene 31 años de edad, está casada, y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 4 años de edad, vive con su familia en el Municipio de Progreso, Yoro.
La actividad económica de María es la elaboración y venta de tajadas de plátano. Las tajadas las vende empacadas en bolsas y las vende en ristras de manera ambulante en las pulperías o en cualquier negocio de la localidad. Este negocio lo comenzó hace dos años con la visión de generar sus propios ingresos donde le diera las facilidades de crecer económicamente. Por eso trabaja desde muy temprano elaborando su producto para después salir a venderlo.
Esta solicitando un préstamo con ODEF de 10,000 lempiras el cual le ayudara a surtir su negocio en compra de insumos para la elaboración de las tajadas como (compra de plátano, aceite, bolsas, grapas, cartoncillo, sal, etc. Para seguir trabajando  y crecer en clientes.
Su meta a seguir  invirtiendo para que su inventario aumente y sacar sus hijos adelante facilitándole los recursos necesarios.
texts.en:
María Suyyapa, 31, is married and has two children who are 5 and 4 years old; she lives with her family in the town of Progreso, Yoro.

María’s economic activity is making fried banana slices to sell.  She sells them packaged in bags and sells them in bunches in an ambulatory way to grocery stores or other local businesses.  She began this business two years ago hoping to generate her own income that would give her the means to grow economically.  Because of this she works from very early making her product to go out later to sell.

She is asking ODEF for a 10,000 lempira loan that will help her stock her business purchasing the supplies she needs to make the fried banana slices (bananas, oil, bags, staples, construction paper, salt, etc.) to continue working and increase clientele.  Her goal is to continue to invest so that her inventory will grow and to raise her children providing them with the necessary resources.

loans.use: to buy bananas, oil, bags, construction paper, salt and staples.

loans.name: Santos Julio

texts.es:
Santos tiene 60 años de edad, de estado civil casado con 2 hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia conjuntamente con su familia, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito, el pueblo joven es pequeño.  Reside en el distrito de la MATANZA - Morropón, correspondiente a Piura, ubicada a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.  La comunidad es pequeña y los pobladores son muy amables con los visitantes.
Santos se dedica a la producción y venta de plátanos de seda en el distrito de MATANZA, desde hace 12 años, su parcela está ubicada a 15 minutos del distrito.
Santos desea invertir en su negocio, específicamente para la compra de urea y accesorios, para darle mantenimiento a la producción de plátanos. Para que de esa manera tenga mejores ingresos y por ende tenga una mejor condición de vida en la comunidad.  Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1508 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
La zona donde reside es ideal para este tipo de negocio, ya que la población sobre todo de los caseríos se dedica a la producción de plátano, sembrío de frejol, es por eso que el riesgo es menor para que inviertan en darle mantenimiento a sus parcelas, y en consecuencia perciban buenas utilidades.

El objetivo principal de vender a un buen precio su producto y captar más clientes potenciales, para ello se esfuerza al máximo y sobre todo trabaja con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Santos is 60 years old, married, and has two children in his care.  He lives in his own home together with his family.  He has good personal and work references from his district.  His recently-established village is small.  He lives in La Matanza - Morropón district, in Piura region, four hours from the city of Chiclayo (the capital of Lambayeque department). This is a small community and its residents are very kind to visitors.

Santos would like to invest in his business.  In particular, he would like to buy urea and supplies to maintain his banana production.  This will make him better income and so he will enjoy better living conditions within his community.  For this reason, he has decided to request a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

The area in which Santos lives is ideal for this type of business and so the local people work producing bananas and beans.  For this reason, the risk of investing in their plots of land is less and they make good profits.

Santos' main goal is to sell his produce for a good price and to attract more potential customers.  In  order to achieve this he works as hard as he can and, above all, he works very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy urea and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 

Evelyn has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She also sells snacks. She has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan for 14,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Evelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Evelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Hira

texts.en:
Hira works hard to support her family. She is married and has a sari-sari (variety) store business in the Philippines.

Hira requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell. She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Hira would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional fresh fish to sell.

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
Bernadeth is 42 years old and married with five children. With two children in school, Bernadeth works very hard to provide for them.

For the past five years Bernadeth has run a sari-sari store where she sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, noodles and other groceries. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

Bernadeth’s ambition is to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. 

Veronica has a pigpen and sells grown & matured pigs. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 12,000 PHP to buy feed for the pigs.

Veronica has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Veronica hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy feed for the pigs

loans.name: Noussissi Group

texts.fr: Le groupement NOUSSISSI est composé de quatorze personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier et exercent des activités génératrices de revenu au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupement, nommée Delphine est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Delphine est âgée de 54 ans, et est mariée à un électricien du nom de Vincent. Le couple a quatre enfants, mais seulement deux sont à leur charge. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Delphine n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Delphine vit ensemble avec ses enfants à charge et son mari ; et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Depuis une vingtaine d’année, Delphine vend des perles et de façon secondaire des bijoux dans des villages du Benin. Delphine s’approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. C’est la deuxième fois que Delphine et les autres membres du groupement NOUSSISSI sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit leur permettra de renforcer leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The group NOUSSISSI comprises fourteen persons who live in the same district and who have revenue-generating businesses in Benin. The representative of this group is named Delphine, and she is the one in the photo with her hand raised. Delphine is 54 years old and married to an electrician by the name of Vincent. They have four children, but only two of them are in their care. Among the children, some have had schooling.

Delphine did not attend school. She lives together with her children to support and her husband. She and her husband jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered.  

For about twenty years, Delphine has been selling beads, and she sells jewelry secondarily in the villages of Benin. She gets her supplies from a city in Benin. 

This is the second time that Delphine and the other members of the group NOUSSISSI have requested a loan from Alidé. This loan will enable them to bolster their businesses to respond better to the demands of their customers. The first loan has been repaid.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and beads

loans.name: Las Abejas Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario se llama las abejas emprendedoras, está conformado por la señora Laura va a comprar con su préstamo mesas, sillas, carne, las señoras Angélica y Leovigilda van a comprar azúcar, jabón, queso, papel higiénico, aceite, huevo, sopa de pasta, la señora Teresa va a comprar 2 tablones para rentar, la señora Marisol va a comprar un refrigerador. 
La señora Angélica tiene 36 años de edad, ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar azúcar, aceite, huevo, jabón, refrescos, galletas para surtir su tienda, ella inicio el negocio hace 2 años por falta de recursos económicos, pues no alcanzaba el salario de su esposo, ella empezó vendiendo dulces y ahora ya crecío a tienda de abarrotes, su negocio es importante porque le ayuda a solventar los gastos de la escuela de sus hijas, a ella le gusta administrar su negocio ver cuanto entra y cuanto sale, va repartiendo las ganancias en  los gastos para sus hijas, la casa y para reinvertir,  ella se siente orgullosa de tener una fuente de ingresos para ayudarles a sus hijas en los gastos de la escuela. Sus sueños y esperanzas son hacer su tienda un minisúper y que sus hijas sean unas mujeres de éxito estudiosas con una carera. Ella está feliz con este préstamo por la oportunidad de ver crecer su negocio y de llevar buena administración del mismo. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les agradecemos la confianza que nos dan al proporcionarnos estos préstamos a personas de comunidades lejanas, nos ayudan a crecer los negocios a seguir trabajando para vivir mejor con la familia”.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Abejas Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Bees) and it’s composed of Laura who will use the loan to buy tables, chairs and meat; Angélica and Leovigilda who will buy sugar, soap, cheese, toilet paper, oil, eggs and noodle soup; Teresa who will buy two planks to rent and Marisol who will buy a refrigerator.

Angélica is 36 years old and has a grocery store.  She asked for her loan to buy sugar, oil, eggs, soap, soft-drinks and cookies to stock her store.  She started the business two years ago due to the lack of economic resources since her husband’s salary was insufficient.  She started out selling candy and now has grown into a grocery store.  Her business is important because it helps her cover her daughters’ school expenses.  She enjoys running her own business, seeing how much comes in and how much goes out.  She divides her profits in her daughters’ expenses, in the house and to reinvest.  She feels proud of having a source of income to help her daughters with their school expenses.

Her hopes and dreams are to turn her store into a mini supermarket and that her daughters become successful, studious career women.  She is happy with this loan because of the opportunity for business growth and to administer it properly.

The members of the group would like to say this to Kiva and Fundación Realidad:  “We are grateful for the trust you’ve placed in us in providing these loans to people in faraway communities; they help us grow our businesses and to continue to work in order to live better with our families.”

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Homidjon

texts.ru: Хомидчон  молодой парень, женат и имеет двоих детей. Он торгует на продовольственном рынке. Его ассортимент состоит из сахара рафинада и рассыпчатого сахара.Хомидчон покупает сахар мешками и продаёт в розницу.Так как с мая месяца сахар подорожает, он хочет закупить несколько мешков сахара.Хомидчон кредитуется с 2008 года, и ни разу не нарушал условий организации и целенаправленно использует кредиты.
texts.en: Homidjon is a young man, he is married and a father of two children. He makes a living by selling groceries at the city market, primarily sugar and sugar cubes. Homidjon buys sacks of sugar and then repackages into smaller quantities. Since in May the price for sugar will seasonally increase, Homidjon wants to buy a few more bags of sugar now. He has been receiving loans since 2008, has never defaulted and always uses the loans for business development.

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her grocery sales.

loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah is 42 years old, married and has five children. The family lives in Gaza in the State of Palestine.

On July 1, 2011 Najah opened an accessories shop for which she now needs to buy additional shelves and display boxes. She is asking Ryada for a 2,000 USD loan to use to this end. She hopes that this loan will improve her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy shelves and display boxes.

loans.name: Bobomurot

texts.ru: Бобомурот женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и активный человек. Более 8 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Также занимается выращиванием зерновых на площади 4 гектаров земли. Бобомурот намерен расширить свой бизнес и запрашивает займ для покупки скота, минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. Прибыль от бизнеса намерен использовать на повышение знаний своих детей и улучшения жилищных условий.
texts.en: Bobomurot is married and is raising two children. He is a very hardworking and active man. He has been selling cattle for more then eight years and he also farms on 4 hectars of land. Bobomurot wants to expand his business and is requesting a loan to purchase more cattle, fertilizer and fuel. He is planning to use the profits from this expansion for educating his children and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cattle, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: El Espacio Group

texts.es:
Concepción cuenta con 42 años de edad  es casada, tiene 2 hijos uno esta estudiando 3° grado de preparatoria y Juan ella solo estudio hasta quinto de primaria ya no quiso estudiar porque repitió grado y no quiso seguir, su esposo se llama Juan y es intendente.
Ella es comerciante tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes la cual dice que tiene desde hace 4 años ella espera que el préstamo le ayude a mejorar el negocio e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de productos de abarrotes como son: aceites, agua, refrescos, leche, huevo, galletas, etc. Concepción le gustaría que el negocio incrementara un poco mas ella dice que le esta echando todas las ganas para que el negocio crezca aun mas.
 
Concepción pertenece al grupo "El Espacio" lo llamaron así porque cuando iniciaron a trabajar con frac era la única empresa que aceptabas hombres en grupo y pues hubo un espacio para ellos, el cual esta integrado por dos hombres y nueve mujeres a continuación serán mencionadas: Daniel, Edith, Enelva, Maria Teresa, Ynocencia, Silvestre, J Carmen, Ariana, Olivia, Rosa, todas realizan actividades comerciales como carnicería, abarrotes, refrescos, polleria, frutas y verduras, artículos de bisutería, comida, etc.
texts.en:
Concepción is 42 years old and married. She has two children, one of which is in the third grade of primary school, and another, Juan. She herself only studied up to the fifth grade of primary school, and then she didn't want to study anymore because she was held back a grade and she didn't want to continue. Her husband is named Juan, and he is an administrator. 

She is a merchant who has a small grocery store. She reports that she has had this business for 4 years. She hopes that the loan will help her improve the store. She will invest her loan in buying grocery products such as cooking oil, water, soft drinks, milk, eggs, cookies, etc. Concepción would like the business to grow a little more; she says that she is putting all of her efforts into helping the business grow even more. 
 
Concepción belongs to the group "El Espacio" ["The Space"]. They gave it this name because when they began working with FRAC, it was the only institution that accepted men in a group, and thus there was a space for them. The group is made up of two men and nine women, as follows: Daniel, Edith, Enelva, Maria Teresa, Ynocencia, Silvestre, J Carmen, Ariana, Olivia and Rosa. All of them pursue commercial activities such as selling meat, groceries, soft drinks, chickens, fruits and vegetables, costume jewelry, food, etc.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, eggs, ham, milk, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase supplies like sweaters, windbreakers, sweatsuits, T-shirts, lingerie and other items.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 42 years old, married and has three children. For the past ten years she has had a shop where she sells chicken barbecue or kebabs.

Geraldine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan to buy more meat for making her chicken barbecue to sell.

Geraldine’s ambition is to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more meat for making her chicken barbecue.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo tiene 59  años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa familiar en el distrito de Pacora, el cual cuenta con servicios de  luz y agua.  El lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 400  familias, y está ubicado a 40 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.

La actividad que desarrolla Eduardo es ofrecer el servicio de peluquería y renovadora de calzado.  Cuenta con experiencia en el rubro desde hace 20 años aprox. Su negocio funciona en casa de su madre, en un lugar acondicionado especialmente para la actividad, no presenta competencia cercana y tiene una ubicación estratégica. Con los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad puede solventar sus gastos y los de su familia.

Eduardo desea comprar materiales para su peluquería (espejos) y su renovadora de zapatos.  Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles, para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 59 years old, he is single and he lives in the house of one of his relatives equipped with electricity and running water. He lives in the district of Pacora, a small community of around 400 families located at about 40 minutes from Chiclayo, the capital city of the Lambayeque department.

Eduardo runs a barber shop and he also works as a shoes repairman. He can count on about 20 years of experience in these fields. His shop is located in his mother’s house, in a place that has been specifically equipped for his activity: he has no immediate competition in the area and the shop is strategically located. Thanks to the money he earns from this activity he is able to pay for his family’s expenses.

Eduardo wants to buy supplies for his barber shop (mirrors) and for his shoes-repairing activity. For this reason he has thought convenient to ask for a loan of 1500 PEN in order to achieve his goal.

loans.use: To buy mirrors for his barber shop and supplies for his shoes-repairing activity.

loans.name: Zhakshilyk Group

texts.ru:
Майрамкул – лидер группы «Жакшылык», ей 36 лет, имеет 3-х детей.  Майрамкул занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 2004 году с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS).  Получая прибыль в сумме около 10,000 сом в месяц, Майрамкул намерена и далее развивать животноводство.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майрамкул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку овец.  Доходы от кредита Майрамкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья. 

Ириме 29 лет. В целях развития своего бизнеса, Ирима обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп скота.  Доходы от кредита Ирима планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья. 
 
Айзаде 31 год, замужем, воспитывает двух детей. В целях развития своего бизнеса, Айзада обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп телят.
texts.en:
Mairamkul is the leader of the group "Zhakshilyk", she is 36 years old and has three children. Mairamkul raises livestock, she has started her business in 2004 with 10,000 som (KGS). Currently her business yields 10,000 som monthly profits and Mairamkul plans to continue investing in livestock. In order to further develop her business Mairamkul has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) which she will use to buy more sheep. She is planning to use the profits from the loan to purchase even more animals for her herd.

Irima is 29 years old. In order to expand her livestock business and buy more animals she is requesting a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) from "Bai-Tushum and partners". She is planning to use her profits to purchase more livestock.

Aizada is 31 years old, married and is raising two children. She has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
Marleni tiene 54 años de edad, está separada de su esposo y tiene 2 hijos.  Reside en el distrito de Zaña perteneciente a la provincia de Chiclayo.

Marleni tiene instalada una pequeña bodega en su vivienda, en ella ofrece a sus clientes abarrotes, cerveza y productos de primera necesidad. Nos comenta que su negocio nació ante la necesidad de contar con un ingreso adicional que le permitiera sacar adelante a su familia, ya que también se dedica a la agricultura y esta actividad no le provee de ingresos permanentes.

El negocio es de utilidad para los vecinos de la zona, y es por ello que desea ampliar su negocio para mejorar su servicio, comprando más mercadería para surtir su negocio.  Es por ello se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su objetivo propuesto.
texts.en:
Marleni, 54, is separated from her husband and has 2 children.  She lives in the Zaña district of Chiclayo province. 

Marleni has a small store set up in her house.  There she offers her customers groceries, beer and consumer staples.  She tells us that she started up her business because she needed to have an additional source of income that would allow her to get ahead with her family.  She also works as a farmer, but this activity does not provide a steady income.

Her business is useful for the neighbors in the area, and so she wants to expand it to provide better service by stocking it with more merchandise.  She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 Peruvian soles so that she can achieve this goal.

loans.use: to buy groceries to stock her store

loans.name: Liz Marlene

texts.es:
Liz es una madre de familia de 30 años de edad que vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Lambayeque, zona que tiene un moderado movimiento comercial, pertenece a la provincia del mismo nombre y se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, el cría aves de corral y animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan con frecuencia la zona. Esta actividad le provee de una fuente estable de ingresos con los cuales saca adelante a su joven familia. 

Liz desea mejorar la crianza de sus animales adquiriendo alimento balanceado de modo que puedan ser vendidos a un mejor precio, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Liz es una madre de familia trabajadora y que siempre vela por el desarrollo y bienestar de los suyos.
texts.en:
Liz is a 30 year old mother living with her family in Lambayeque District, a zone with moderate commercial activity belonging to the province of the same name located twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

She raises animals to sell; she raises barnyard fowl and small farm animals in her back yard.  When they reach a good level of development she sells them to merchants who frequently visit the zone.  This activity provides her with a stable source of income with which to support her family.

Liz wants to improve raising her animals acquiring nutritionally balanced feed so that they can be sold at better prices.  To reach her objective she needs to request her first, 1000 new sol, loan from Edpyme Alternativa.

Liz is a hardworking mother who always watches over her loved ones’ development and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Reysan

texts.en:
Reysan is thirty years old, separated from her husband and has two children. For the past five years she has made and sold snacks such as aripahol, or steamed cassava cakes.

Reysan has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan to buy additional ingredients to make her snacks.

Reysan’s ambition is to improve her snack business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients to make her snacks.

loans.name: Tuigunali

texts.ru: Туйгунали трудолюбивый и целеустремленный семьянин. У него очень хорошая и дружная семья. Последние 2 года он занимается купле- продажей скота, а также параллельно занимается выращиванием картошки и ячменя. Туйгунали хочет расширить бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль. Полученную прибыль намерен использовать для покупки автомобиля на свадьбы дочки и внуков. Туйгунали запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота и семян картошки и ячменя.
texts.en: Tuigunali is a hardworking and goal oriented man. He has a good and tight knit family. For two years now Tuigunali has been reselling livestock and growing potatoes and oats. Tuigunali wants to expand his business and earn a good profit. He is planning to use these profits to purchase a car for the weddings of his daughter and his grandson. Tuigunali is requesting a loan to purchase cattle and oat and potato seeds.

loans.use: To buy cattle and seeds

loans.name: Pazliddin

texts.ru: Пазлиддин мужчина в возрасте 43 лет,женат,имеет 4 детей.Он проживает в сельской местности. Пазлиддин знаток своего дела и среди населения имеет хороший авторитет.С детства он помогал отцу по откорму скота и выращиванию сельскохозяйственных культур.Основной доход семьи от реализации сельхоз культур,от продажи скота и от реализации кисломолочных продуктов.А так же дочка клиента занимается щитьём национальных платьев для сельских женщин.На полученный кредит Пазлиддин хочет оплатит договор аренды земли,закупить минеральные удобрение для посева риса и лука.
texts.en: Pazliddin is a 43 year old man, married and has four children. He lives in the country side. Pazliddin is a master of his trade and has a lot of respect among his community. Since his childhood he has been helping his father to raise livestock and grow crops. Pazliddin's household main income comes from selling crops, livestock and dairy products. His daughter also sews national Tajik dresses for the local women. Pazliddin is planning to use this loan to rent land where he is going to grow rice and onions, as well as purchase fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to pay for planting rice and onions

loans.name: Elver

texts.es:
Elver tiene 28 años de edad, es separado de su pareja y tiene 1 hijo, con el que vive en casa de sus madre,  en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

El cuenta con una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para transportar pasajeros y carga) con la que brinda servicio de transporte público desde hace 4 años en el distrito de Tambogrande y en las zonas aledañas.  También le ayuda a su madre a repartir ropa, la cual vende. Ambos, su madre y él afrontan los gastos del hogar.

El contínuo uso otorgado a su unidad móvil y el estado accidentado de los caminos de la zona han hecho que su vehículo empiece a sufrir algunas fallas que requieren de urgente reparación para garantizar su correcto funcionamiento, por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Elver, 28, is separated from his spouse; he has a son he lives with in his mother’s house in Tambogrande District, a district dedicated primarily to farming fruit that’s exported to other countries.  It belongs to Piura Province in the region with the same name located over three hours from the city of Chiclayo.

He owns a mototaxi (motorized vehicle consisting of a motorcycle with an attached cabin to transport passengers and cargo) that he has been using to provide public transportation services for the last four years in Tambogrande District and surrounding areas.  He also helps his mother distribute clothing that she sells.  His mother and he share household expenses.

Continuous use of his mototaxi and the rough condition of the roads in his zone have caused the vehicle to start to have mechanical problems that require urgent attention to guarantee its continued good functioning so he’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for his first, 2000 new sol, loan.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo de estado civil conviviente, tiene 39 años de edad con 1 hijo a su cargo.  Vive en casa propia conjuntamente con su esposa en el distrito de la MATANZA, correspondiente a Piura, ubicada a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.  La comunidad es pequeña y los pobladores son muy amables con los visitantes.
Gerardo se dedica a la venta de carnes rojas, asimismo a la crianza y venta de animales menores, tales como ovejas, chivos, pavos entre otros desde hace 3 años en su localidad.
Gerardo desea invertir en su negocio, específicamente la compra de animales, ya que a la fecha está a un buen precio en la zona, asimismo para arreglar su local de venta para que de esa manera tenga mejores ingresos y por ende una mejor condición de vida.  Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1008 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
El mercado es potencial para la inversión en este tipo de negocio, por lo que el cliente necesita invertir de manera satisfactoria  y tenga mejores utilidades.
El objetivo principal del cliente es captar más clientes potenciales en la zona y vender más, y para lograr todo esto el cliente se esfuerza al máximo y trabaja todo los días con mucha responsabilidad y sobre todo brinda un buen trato al cliente.
texts.en:
Gerardo, 39, has a spouse and a son in his care.  He lives in his own house with his wife in Matanza District belonging to Piura located four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque Department.  The community is small and its residents are kind to visitors.

Gerardo sells red meat and also raises small farm animals like sheep, goats and turkeys, among others, to sell locally; he’s been in business three years.

Gerardo wants to invest in his business specifically purchasing animals because they are currently at good prices in the zone; he also wants to fix up his sales locale so that income will improve and thus improve his living conditions.  To reach his objective he’s thought it convenient to obtain a 1008 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa.

The market has good potential for investment in this type of business so the client needs to invest satisfactorily and have better profits.  The client’s main objective is to capture more potential customers in the zone and to sell more and to do so he strives to the maximum degree and works every day very responsibly and above all provides good customer service.

loans.use: to buy animals to resell.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Estrella has a shop where she sells fish, like sardines and mackerel. She has had this business for 15 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy more stock of fish for sell.

Estrella has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Estrella hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites, 44, is married and has three children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

For the past five years Marites has worked catching fish. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her business.

Marites’ ambition is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 

Rosalinda has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 2 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy more stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Rosalinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Rosalinda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Robert

texts.es:
Robert tiene 41 años de edad, es casado y tiene 2 hijos.  Vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Piura, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.
Robert es albañil, y es muy conocido y apreciado en su localidad, ya que ha hecho diversos trabajos en este distrito.  Paralelamente es  agricultor desde hace  8 años.
Robert necesita comprar herramientas de trabajo, tales como tablas, andamios, carretillas, entre otros, además desea invertir en su parcela, para que de esa manera tenga mejores ingresos y por ende una mejor condición de vida en la zona.

La zona donde vive es ideal para brindar este tipo de servicio, ya que  los maestros albañiles no son muchos y los que hay están en pleno trabajo, y es por eso que necesita invertir para que tenga mejores ingresos.
Su objetivo principal es brindar un buen servicio a la población para que su trabajo nunca falte, para eso Robert trabaja con mucha responsabilidad y con dedicación, adicionalmente ha creído conveniente obtener un crédito de 2010 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en: Robert is 41 years old, married and has two children. He lives with his family in the district of Piura, an agricultural area with regular commercial movement in the province of Lambayeque, more than two hours from the city of Chiclayo. Robert is a construction worker, and he is very well known and appreciated in his town because he has worked on diverse jobs in the district. Along with this, he has also been a farmer for the past eight years. Robert needs to purchase tools, such as planks, scaffolding, wheelbarrows and other items, and he also wants to invest in his land. In this way he can increase his profits and thus a better quality of life. The area where he lives is ideal for his kind of work, since there are not many master builders and there is always work, and that's why he needs to invest in the business. His main goal is to provide a good service to the population and for his work to always hold up, and that's why Robert works with a lot of responsibility and dedication, and why he is turning to Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Santos Candido

texts.es:
Santos tiene 62 años de edad, es conviviente y vive con su pareja y su nieta en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Al igual que la mayoría de personas en la zona, él se dedica a la agricultura.  Trabaja en un terreno (2.50 ha), allí siembra limón, el cual cosecha semanalmente. Esta actividad le permite agenciarse de ingresos con los cuales se encarga del mantenimiento de su familia. Adicionalmente vende animales menores, cuando estos alcanzan el peso ideal en el mercado de su localidad.

Santos desea que su cultivo tenga una buena producción, por ello trabaja arduamente para lograr su objetivo. Actualmente desea adquirir abonos y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo y para ayudarse, ha decidido  solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

Santos es alguien conocido en la zona, sus vecinos le consideran una persona trabajadora y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es tener éxito en su actual cosecha y en las cosechas futuras para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Santos, 62, lives with his spouse and granddaughter in Tambogrande District, a district primarily dedicated to growing fruit for export to other countries.  It belongs to Piura Province in the region of the same name located over three hours from the city of Chiclayo.

Like most people in the area, he’s a farmer.  He works a parcel of land (2.5 hectares) where he grows lemons that are harvested weekly.  This activity allows him to earn income to support his family.  He also sells small farm animals in his local market when they reach ideal weight.

Santos wants his crops to produce well so he works hard to reach this objective.  He currently wants to buy manure and pesticide to provide crop maintenance and to help him do so, he’s decided to request his first, 1200 new sol, loan from Edpyme Alternativa.

Santos is well-known in the area; his neighbors consider him to be a hardworking, responsible person.  His greatest hope is to be successful with is current crop and in future harvests in order to move his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy crop fertilizer.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Francisca, es madre soltera, vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de San Pedro Sula, Cortes junto a su hijo que tiene 14 años de edad quien está cursando sus estudios actualmente.
Doña francisca es muy emprendedora ella siempre quiso trabajar en lo propio y con muchos esfuerzos logro establecerlo, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la elaboración de queso, mantequilla, cuajada y otros.
Trabaja todo el día realizando esta actividad.
Ella  ha mantenido su negocio con préstamos, actualmente solicita el  cuarto préstamo a ODEF, para invertirlo en la compra de leche, cuajo, sal y otros insumos para elaborar queso, mantequilla, cuajada, etc. 
Su meta es mantener siempre la materia prima para su negocio y mantener su clientela.
texts.en:
Francisca is a single mother who lives in a village in the San Pedro Sula municipality in Cortes.  She lives with her 14 year old son, and he goes to school.

Francisca is very enterprising.  She always wanted to work on her own, and with a great deal of effort she managed to establish her own business.  For several years she has been making cheese, butter, curds, and others.  She works all day at this business activity.

She has continued with her business with loans.  She is currently requesting her fourth loan with ODEF.  She will use it to buy milk, curds, salt, and other supplies to make cheese, butter, and curds, etc.

Her goal is to always have the raw materials for her business on hand and to keep her clientele.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her business like milk, curds, salt, and other supplies to make cheese, butter, and curds, etc.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María tiene 22 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo. Vive en casa familiar con su conviviente y su hijo, además de sus suegros. La casa está ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande. Cliente vive en la parte céntrica del distrito y cuenta con los servicios básicos.
La actividad que desarrolla la titular es la venta de gaseosas, jugos y postres en propio domicilio en el cual atiende permanentemente y cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona, Su conviviente es trabajador estable en una fábrica y le pagan semanalmente.  Ambos cooperan para el sostenimiento de la familia.
María desea comprar calaminas para mejorar el techado de su casa, que se han deteriorado por las constantes lluvias.  Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Maria, 22, lives in her in-laws’ house along with her common-law-husband and their one son.  The house is in the Tambogrande district in the central area and it has basic services.
She sells soft drinks, juices and desserts from her own house where she is always available  to take care of customers and has an established customer base in the area.  Her husband has a regular job in a factory and receives a weekly salary.  They both work to cover the family expenses.
Maria wants to buy corrugated metal to improve the roof of her house because it has deteriorated from the constant rain.  That is why she decided it would be good to get a loan of 1500 new sols from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to improve the roof of her house

loans.name: Elioberta

texts.en:
Elioberta is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with 3 children. 

Elioberta has a shop that sells a variety of dried fish per kilogram. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy stocks of dried fish for selling.

Elioberta has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Elioberta hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of dried fish for selling

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 57 years old from Olkalou, and is married to Esther. They have one child, who is in school.

John has applied for his third loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy fertilizers and seedlings. He is optimistic that his business will do well after the loan.

He hopes to boost his farming methods, be the top farmer in the Olkalou area and use his income to increase his living standards.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings

loans.name: Anastasia

texts.en:
Anastasia is 49 years old and a mixed crop farmer. She is married to Ignatio, a business man. They are blessed with two children. She has been a farmer for the past 12 years with a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to support her family.

Anastasia is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced to the lending agency by a KADET staff member. She will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. 

With the anticipated profit from her business, she will educate her children. Her hope is to venture into dairy keeping.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Nicolette

texts.ru:
Николет вложила предыдущий кредит в приобретение лазерно-звукового оборудования для проведения косметических процедур для кожи лица. Она также перешла из одного салона красоты в другой, который находится в центре города, в следствие чего сменилась и увеличилась клиентура. 
Николет хочет вложить кредит КИВА в приобретение новейших косметических средств по уходу за телом, волосами и кожей для последующей реализации их у себя в салоне во время предоставления разного рода косметических услуг. Она закупила качественные кремы, маски, скрабы, тонизирующие средства, чтобы ее клиенткам не нужно было искать подходящую косметику где-то за рубежом, а можно было приобрести необходимые продукты на месте.
texts.en: Nicolette invested her previous loan into a purchase of a sound-laser equipment for cosmetic procedures for facial skin.  She also moved from one beauty salon to another, located in the city center, due to which her clientele changed and grew.  Nicolette wants to invest the Kiva loan into a purchase of the latest body, hair and skin cosmetic treatments to resell at her salon while providing various types of cosmetic service.  She bought quality creams, masks, scrubs, and toners so that her clients did not have to search for suitable cosmetics somewhere abroad and could buy necessary products in one place.

loans.use: to purchase the latest body, hair and skin cosmetic treatments to resell at her salon

loans.name: Nana

texts.fr:
Madame Nana est une femme mariée de 50 ans et mère de 6 enfants. Elle vit avec son mari et ses enfants dans le quartier Niebala de Bougouni. 
Ayant abandonnée l’école en classe de 6ème année fondamentale (système éducatif Malien), elle décida d’apprendre les activités génératrices de revenus.
C’est ainsi qu’elle suivra sa sœur pour apprendre les activités d’achat et de vente de chaussures et d’habits.
Avec une expérience de plus de 20 ans, elle maitrise cette activité et est très sollicitée et appréciée à Bougouni. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante et exigeante, elle intègre le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso avec qui elle est à sa premier prêt.
Elle compte acheter avec son prêt, 3 douzaines de vêtements pour femme, 2 pièces de tissus et  1 douzaine de chaussures.
 Elle s’approvisionne au Burkina Faso et à Bamako, elle revend ses produits en ambulant dans les différents quartiers de Bougouni et à domicile, à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes.
Elle compte réaliser  avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 45 000 FCFA. Avec ce bénéfice elle envisage agrandir son entreprise.
texts.en:
Nana is 50 years old, married, and the mother of 6 children.  She lives with her husband and children in the Niebala neighborhood of Bougouni.

Having left school at the level of the 6th year (Malian education system), she decided to gain some experience in income-generating activities. Following the footsteps of her sister, she became involved in buying and selling shoes and clothes.  She now has over 20 years of experience in this field and manages her business well.  She is very valued and very much in demand in Bougouni.  In order to meet the needs of her customers who are becoming more demanding and whose numbers are increasing, she has joined Soro Yiriwaso.  This is her first loan.

With this loan, she is planning to purchase 3 dozen outfits for women, 2 sets of fabrics and one dozen shoes.

She stocks up in Burkina Faso and in Bamako.  She resells her merchandise door-to-door in the various neighborhoods of Bougouni, and also from her home.  Her customers are mostly women.

With this loan, she is expecting monthly profits to reach 45,000 CFA francs.  With these profits, she is planning to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy various items such as women's clothing, fabric and shoes.

loans.name: Cesar Alberto

texts.es:
Cesar Alberto tiene 21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con los padres en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la Vrc Nuevos Horizontes, la comunidad se encuentra a unos 40 minutos en la comunidad santa Martha perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda.

Cesar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra y a la venta de  naranjilla, además cría animales como los cerdos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos,semillas, fertilizantes,  líquidos para la maleza y comprar polvillo.  Con el dinero del crédito podrá comprar los abonos para mejorar la producción.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda  semanalmente. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo para transportar los  productos que cosecha.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal tiempo. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor y disfrutar del carnaval.
texts.en:
Cesar Alberto is 21 years old. He is single, he has no children, and he lives with his parents in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

He is a member of the Vrc Nuevos Horizontes, the community is found about 40 minutes away in the community of Santa Martha, belonging to the canton of Guaranda.

Cesar works in agriculture, sowing and selling naranjilla. In addition, he raises animals such as pigs. He requests the loan to buy fertilizers, seeds, liquid weed killers, and to buy animal feed. With the money from the loan he'll be able to buy fertilizers to improve his production.

He does his buying and selling in Guaranda once a week. His dream is to be able to buy a vehicle to transport his products that he harvests. The challenges facing him are plagues and bad weather. In his free time he likes to play indoor soccer and enjoy local festivals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, liquid weed killers, and animal feed.

loans.name: Teodulo

texts.es:
Teodulo tiene 50 años de edad de estado civil viudo, con 2 hijos a su cargo.  Vive en casa propia en el distrito de La Matanza, en Piura, a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la comunidad, el caserío es pequeño y los habitantes son muy tratables.
Se dedica a la producción y venta de plátanos de seda desde hace 7 años, además se dedica  al sembrío de maíz y frejol.
Teodulo desea comprar urea y sus derivados para darle mantenimiento a su parcela ya que es la época de la plaga en la zona, además una parte del crédito lo necesita para invertirlo en el sembrío de maíz, para que de esa manera tenga mejores  ingresos y por ende una mejor condición de vida.  Es por ello que ha considerado conveniente obtener un préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles.
El mercado es potencial para este tipo de cultivo, ya que la zona es conocida mayormente por la producción de plátanos y el sembrío de maíz y otros derivados. Para ello necesita invertir y así tenga buenas utilidades en un corto plazo.
El objetivo principal del cliente es producir buenos plátanos y venderlos a un buen precio dentro de pocos meses, para ello se esfuerza al máximo para alcanzar su meta, y trabaja todos los días desde muy temprano y lo hace con mucha responsabilidad, además es muy conocido en la zona.
texts.en:
Teodulo, 50, is a widower with 2 children in his care.  He lives in his own home in the Matanza district of Piura, 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo.  He has good work and personal references in his community, which is a small rural settlement where the residents are very congenial.

Teodulo has been cultivating and selling yellow bananas for 7 years.  He also cultivates corn and beans.

Teodulo wants to buy urea and its derivatives to use in maintaining his parcel of land, because this is the season for crop diseases in his area.  In addition, he will invest part of this loan in the cultivation of corn, so that he can have a better income and thus a better quality of life.  It is for this reason that he is requesting a loan of 3,000 Peruvian soles.

The market has good potential for investment in this type of crop, because this area is known mainly for its production of bananas, corn, and other crops.  So to take advantage of this, he needs to invest.  This way, he will have better profits in the near term.

Teodulo's main goal is to produce good bananas and sell them at a good price within a couple of months.  To do this, he will exert himself to the maximum to reach this goal, working every day from the very early hours, and working responsibly.  Also, he is very well known in the area.

loans.use: to buy urea and its derivatives to maintain his parcel of land

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is 60 years old and a mixed crop farmer. He is married to Monica, a businesswoman. They are blessed with two children. He has been in a farming business for the past 14 years with a monthly income of KES 10,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan unsuccessfully due to crop diseases, which affected all his crops. Bernard will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm

loans.name: Tausi Group

texts.en:
The borrower, who is in his early 40s, is single with one child, who is still going to school. He has been selling secondhand shoes for 20 years now. He works from 8.00 am to 6.00 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his 11th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase the shoes' stock, buy a shamba, buy a motorcycle and pay for household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He wants a loan to buy more stock of secondhand shoes to resell. His dream is to one day be able to buy another motorcycle and a car.

He will share this loan with his loan group, "Tausi", which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more stock of secondhand shoes to resell

loans.name: Tep

texts.en:
Tep, 64, is a responsible and diligent mother who resides in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province, Cambodia. She is married and has six children, four of whom are married and two of whom are single. Tep describes herself as a humble farmer. However, she will always strive to work to uplift her family from hunger and poverty. Besides rice husbandry, Tep operates a pig-raising business at home for extra income. 

At present, she would like a loan from HKL to purchase a plowing machine for use on her farmland. These funds will enable Tep to develop her current business. She is very happy and appreciative of the great support from our generous lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a plowing machine for use on her farmland.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.en:
Daniela is 43 years old and has 4 children. She is married and has 1 child in school.

Daniela is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Daniela requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Daniela has been raising pigs for 5 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Daniela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gleceria

texts.en:
Gleceria works hard to support her family. She is single and has a business selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines.

Gleceria requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

She has been in this business for 6 years.

In the future, Gleceria would like to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 39 años de edad, es casado y tiene 04  hijos como carga familiar. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío Juan Velasco Alvarado del Distrito de Tambogrande.  Vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y solo cuenta con servicio básico de energía eléctrica.

Víctor se dedica a la agricultura, contando a la fecha con 1,50 has de terreno sembrado de limón y mango; además de productos de pan llevar.  Su esposa cuenta con una bodega donde atiende todos los días y ambos se apoyan mutuamente.  Los ingresos que perciben de las actividades a las que se dedican, los invierten en sus gastos personales y en los gastos familiares. 

Víctor desea comprar fertilizantes y realizar labores de poda y deshierbo en sus terrenos, asimismo invertirá en compra de agua para riego del cultivo, así se lograra una mejor cosecha de sus productos y venderlos a un mejor precio.  Para lograr su objetivo, Víctor ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1800 nuevos soles.
texts.en: Víctor is 39 years old, married and has four children under his care. He lives in his own home in the hamlet of Juan Velasco Alvarado in a rural part of the district of Tambogrande that only has basic electrical service. Victor makes a living in agriculture, and has to date 1.5 hectares of land planting lemons and mangoes. His wife has a convenience store that she tends to every day, and they support each other. They take the profits from their businesses and use them for personal and household expenses. Victor wishes to purchase fertilizers and hire workers for pruning and weeding his land, as well as purchase irrigation water for his crops. In this way he will be able to have a better harvest and sell his products at a better price. Victor is requesting a loan to achieve this objective.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and hire workers.

loans.name: Dora  Elia

texts.es: La señora Dora es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable , a lo largo de los créditos  que a  tenido en la  institución se  ha  caracterizado  por tener  un excelente  cultura  de pagos, lo cual  nos  da  la oportunidad  de  apoyarla  en los  diferentes  proyectos  que  tiene, es  por  ella  que  en esta  ocasión requiere  de  nuestra  ayuda  para  construir  un cuarto de lavado  en su  vivienda,  ya que  nos comenta  que  en  temporadas  de  invierno  se  ha  enfermado en varias  ocasiones  ya que  tiene  que  salir   al patio,  ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de hacer  su  sueño  una realidad  por lo que  se  encuentra  muy  contenta.
texts.en: Dora is a very hardworking and responsible person. Throughout the loans she has had with the institution, she has distinguished herself for having an excellent repayment record. This allows us to support her in her various projects, and that is why on this occasion she requests our help in order to build a laundry room in her home.
